# kvlm-layout

A component to introduce the application layout.

## Slots

| Name     | Description      |
|----------|------------------|
|          | The default slot |
| `header` | The header slot  |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property                              | Default   | Description                                      |
|---------------------------------------|-----------|--------------------------------------------------|
| `--kvlm-layout-header-offset`         |           | Sets the offset of the header for **all devices**.<br />_Will be overwritten by the specific mobile and desktop values if not set._ |
| `--kvlm-layout-header-offset-desktop` | "16rem"   | The offset of the header on desktop devices      |
| `--kvlm-layout-header-offset-mobile`  | "12.6rem" | The offset of the header on mobile devices       |
| `--kvlm-layout-min-height`            | "100svh"  | The minimum height of the layout                 |
